Type.Name: UrlMembershipCondition

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IConstantMembershipCondition, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.

summary.para: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its URL. This class cannot be inherited.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string url) cil managed

remarks.para: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm.
URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/*.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with the URL that determines membership.

Docs.param: The URL for which to test.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Check (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Check(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

remarks.para: This membership condition tests only the evidence object.

summary.para: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.

returns.para: true if the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition; otherwise, false.

Docs.param: The evidence set against which to make the test.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Url { get; set; }
.property instance string Url

remarks.para: The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL.
URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position. For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/* is a wildcard URL.

summary.para: Gets or sets the URL for which the membership condition tests.
